content:
Requesting review on this PR which proves Hecke's bound for the coefficients of a modular form. It adds a single new file of ~350 lines.

This PR has been awaiting review for quite a while now – possibly because of a queueboard bug, which is causing several PR's including this one to be wrongly labelled on the queueboard as "WIP, blocked by other PR" when it's not. Bryan is doing his best to fix the queueboard bug, but I just want to highlight here that the PR is actually ready for review.
